author: admin
title: Nigeria's leader seeks extended medical leave, fanning ill health rumours - Reuters
text: Nigeria's leader seeks extended medical leave, fanning ill health rumours - Reuters Reuters ABUJA President Muhammadu Buhari on Sunday asked parliament to extend his medical leave, his office said in a statement, deepening suspicions amongst many Nigerians that his health worse than officials are publicly admitting. The statement did not say â€¦
